snippet.title: Holy Shoot | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A Brand New Epic Rogue-like FPS!

For centuries, seven sacred artifacts have remained safely hidden on the earth. The artifacts were brought to this world to uphold goodness with their magical powers. Since ancient times, the Order of the Sanctum has watched over the artifacts. Until now that is! Some pesky demons have stolen them all and taken them to Hell! 

In this forthcoming First Person Shooter, rogue-like game, you play as a member of the Order of Sanctum. Armed with an array of kick-arse weapons and angelic-given powers, your job is to take down those demon suckers! 

However, seven pretty nasty demon bosses are ready to fight you for the artifacts. Don’t worry though! You have a troop of ghost knight ancestors to lend you a hand! 

It is going to be messy, it is going to get crazy, and all hell will break out down there! But be ready to fight. Be ready to laugh! We are the Order of the Sanctum!

It’s Time To Go To Hell!
► Website: https://holyshoot.taleera.com
► Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2881660/Holy_Shoot/

For more news, stay tuned to:
https://twitter.com/HolyShootGame
https://www.instagram.com/holyshootgame/
https://www.twitch.tv/holyshootgame
